duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide hospitalist services including admissions, rounding, consults, and discharges.
Collaborate with other physicians, specialists, and healthcare professionals to ensure comprehensive patient care.
Maintain accurate and timely electronic medical records (EMR) using Allscripts SCM.
Adhere to Board Certification requirements and guidelines for the American Board of Internal Medicine (ABIM) or American Board of Family Medicine (ABFM)IMLC Accepted.

education_certification.credential: Board Certification required: ABIM or ABFM (IMLC Accepted)
